item.title: Writing a Simple Shell in C Sharp
item.author: kiennt2609@gmail.com (Kien Nguyen-Tuan)
item.description: In this post, we will write a minimalistic shell for UNIX(-like) operating systems in C# programming language. I create this for learning C# purpose. Since its purpose demonstration (not feature completeness or even fitness for causual use), it has many limitations, including: Commands must be on a single line. Arguments must be separated by whitespace. No quoting arguments or escaping whitespace. No piping or redirection. Before we start, make sure you have .
